caption.p: The protein expressions of nuclear NF-κB, cytosolic NF-κB, and IκB-α in PM 10-exposed A549 lung epithelial cells. The experiments were carried out in triplicate measurements. Results are presented as mean ± standard error of the mean. ### p < 0.001 vs. non-treated cells; * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01 and *** p < 0.001 vs. PM 10-treated cells.
